about_the_game:
WHERE YOUR THERAPY BEGINS.

Once a beacon of hope and medical advancement, Haven Institution has spiraled into something far more sinister. Patients enter with hope, only to be met with sickening and twisted experiments all in the name of "perfection." Overseen by the malevolent Dr. Evelyn Vane, the facility now operates in complete secrecy, producing a volatile chemical known as Euphorium—said to unlock untapped human potential through controlled suffering.

As a newly admitted patient, you are seen as merely another cog in this inhumane machine. Under the eyes of the Crimson Insurgency, escape is impossible, and resistance is met with brutal punishment. The walls whisper with the voices of the past—those who have found their smiles. Will you?

INSIDE HAVEN

Every soul has a role to play. From the broken minds of the patients to the unwavering hand of the doctors, and those who walk the fine line between savior and monster—each contributes to the facility's twisted pursuit of perfection.

DR. EVELYN VANE - THE OVERSEER

The architect of the Haven Institution's "therapy" program. A brilliant yet deeply twisted psychologist, she oversees every experiment with a cold detachment that unnerves even the staff.

Believing that pain leads to enlightenment, Vane sees her patients as nothing more than lab rats for her morbid pursuit of perfection. Her methods speak volumes... terrifying ones.

DR. VIKTOR HARKER - THE BUTCHER

Dr. Viktor Harker is the Haven Institution's chief surgeon, a title he wears with pride. Cold and unflinching, Harker treats patients like living experiments, carving away their humanity to make way for his grotesque creations.

A loyal ally to Vane, he believes his hands can sculpt perfection... but perfection often screams.

EUPHORIUM OPERATIVES - THE SILENT WORKFORCE

The unseen lifeblood of the Haven Institution, Euphorium Operatives toil in alliance to extract and package the malevolent compound Euphorium.

Hidden behind respirators and layers of protective gear, they are as much prisoners of the institution as the patients they unwittingly serve.

CRIMSON INSURGENCY - THE ENFORCERS

Tasked with maintaining control withing the Haven Institution, the Crimson Insurgency are a paramilinary force operating with unflinching loyalty. Heavily armed and ever-vigilant, they ensure the Institution's dark agenda remains uninterrupted.

These operatives are more than just guards, they are the shadows that patrol the corridors, upholding the grim order. To them, morality is a luxury they cannot afford.

YOUR THERAPY BEGINS TODAY.

Learn the shady past of The Haven Institution and discover where it all went wrong. Escape is uncertain. Compliance is expected. You will find your smile too.

content_descriptors.notes: Project Smile contains content that may not be appropriate for all ages: Frequent depictions of gore and violence, general mature content.
